name: Scholarly Complex
context: These advanced tablets were excavated from what appears to be an ancient academy or library. The complex features multiple chambers with different specializations - astronomy, medicine, mathematics, and natural philosophy. Many tablets show scholarly discourse, with corrections and annotations in multiple hands suggesting collaborative study.
